title: Friday Roundup: LoveYourBrain & Win a Revel, Commencal, Basso bike, helmet, bag & more!
content:
LoveYourBrain & Win a custom painted Revel Ranger – For the third year in a row, Revel is raising money for the LoveYourBrain Foundation with a custom bike raffle. The one-of-a-kind mountain bike started life as a regular 115mm travel 29er Ranger, before getting tricked out with a custom white paint scheme topped off with special

The post Friday Roundup: LoveYourBrain & Win a Revel, Commencal, Basso bike, helmet, bag & more! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
